definitions: the quality of being subject to one or more conditions or requirements being met

examples.text: the granting of any required financial assistance will be made subject to strict conditionality

shortDefinitions: quality of being subject to conditions being met

definitions: the quality of a clause, phrase, etc. expressing a condition

examples.text: there are distinct morphological markings available to signal conditionality

shortDefinitions: quality of clause, etc. expressing condition
